description: Complex Example Mapping session that likely needs story splitting

inputs.userStory: As a user, I want to manage my account settings including profile, password, notifications, privacy, and billing, so that I can control my experience

splitStories: As a user, I want to update my profile information
As a user, I want to change my password
As a user, I want to manage notification preferences
As a user, I want to control privacy settings
As a user, I want to update billing information
expectedOutputs.readiness: not ready - story too large, needs splitting
